name: ザ・グレイト・ラグタイムショー
summary:
Boogie Wings (known in Japan as The Great Ragtime Show (ザ・グレイト・ラグタイムショー)) is a side-scrolling shooter arcade game released by Data East in 1992. The game contains unique gameplay, but was never ported to other consoles because of its relative unpopularity in arcade centers.
The game is set around the time of World War I, where the player maneuvers biplanes, automobiles, animals, and various other unidentifiable objects to battle an army of mech-wielding scientists.
